title: Is there a reliable online personality development course available for teenage children? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there is one. I do one-on-one mentoring of higher secondary and senior secondary students. This not just personality development. It is all about the self development. Your priorities of life define the patterns of life that result in the success or struggle for success of life. I help young ones to understand identify and execute a plan to come out as a successful human being. Studies and Educational Results are still the onus of the kids. If you are looking for percent generation model. This is not for you. If you agree the children needs to have firm grounding and fundamental understanding of of their priorities of life and walk the talk… This is the place for them. You may contact me in person, for more details. Cheers
